name: Fjallraven Ulvo 23L Backpack - Unisex
description:
A daily classic, ready for commutes, afternoon hikes or short travels. Fjallraven fabric is hardwearing and durable, and it's water-resistant in case of a surprise shower. A dedicated compartment cradles your laptop, while a huge main compartment holds everything your day requires – workout clothes, lunch, wallet, keys and more.Water-resistant Bergshell ripstop fabric uses 31% recycled nylon.Shoulder straps and back panel are padded with ventilated airmesh.Interior organizer pocket and padded compartment fits a laptop up to 15in.2 stretchy side pockets hold water bottles or an umbrella.Attachment loop for a bike light.

        Sustainability
